data.title: Neighbourhood + Transit
data.meta_description: Join Vancouver’s vibrant and diverse East Village community with Yarrow (444 Kootenay Street) and Aster (435 Boundary Road) rental homes. 94 rental homes in Yarrow and 118 rental homes in Aster.
data.text:
Kootenay Bus Loop

Just across the street, the Kootenay Bus Loop serves as a transit centre, giving you quick access to buses reaching Downtown, North Vancouver, and Metrotown Station.

RapidBus

Quickly and easily reach Burrard Station or the SFU Exchange via the RapidBus R5 along Hastings.

Phibbs Exchange

Reach even more connections with a 5 minute bus ride to Phibbs Exchange across the bridge, giving you access to buses across North Vancouver.

Eastbound via Millennium/Expo Line

Make your way eastbound from the Kootenay Bus Loop to ride the Millennium Line or Expo Line, conveniently giving you access to areas such as Burnaby, the Tri-Cities, New Westminster, and Surrey.

Sal y Limon, a Mexican food restaurant, is the perfect destination for families and friends of all ages who want to enjoy a fun and lively atmosphere. With a focus on providing an incredible experience to all patrons, the restaurant offers a diverse range of food options to cater to different lifestyles, including healthy, vegetarian, vegan, gluten-free, and dairy-free. All the food at Sal y Limon is prepared in-house using fresh ingredients, ensuring the highest quality and flavor. The restaurant prides itself on serving food quickly, emulating the best taquerias and street carts found throughout Mexico. It’s the ideal place to gather with loved ones and enjoy a delightful meal together.

Step into our vibrant and modern sanctuary for a tapestry of freshly baked delights, savory treats, artisanal coffees, and handcrafted cocktails. At Mad Hatter, every bite and sip are a testament to our devotion to quality and creativity. Whether you’re in need of an audacious dine-in escape or a delightful grab-and-go, our doors are open to indulge your every craving. We’re building a community of food enthusiasts, coffee lovers, and cocktail aficionados, all united by our shared passion for exceptional taste and service. Our commitment goes beyond the menu, creating an inclusive and respectful atmosphere that makes every guest feel cherished. Dive into the Mad Hatter experience, where every detail is a chapter in our story of flavor, innovation, and heartwarming hospitality. It’s not just a meal; it’s an unforgettable moment designed to stir joy and inspire wonder.

Medzone Pharmacy by Mettra – An innovative concept by mettra Pharmacy brand. This new Retail Pharmacy Model is committed to being the heart of healthcare in the communities they serve. At mettra, your Pharmacist will work proactively and collaboratively to provide pharmacist-initiated preventative health care solutions. Sama’s Health Group practices a holistic approach to pharmaceutical care that combines precision and balance to help patients live their best and healthiest lives.

Pharmacy Services:

Vaccinations/Travel Medicine

Health Management

Point of Care Testing (PCOT)

Medication Synchronization

Holistic Health Care

Twisted Indian was born out of need to present Indian food in a unique light. Twisted Indian menu lays focus on healthy options. Menu items that didn’t contribute negatively to customers’ health. We’ve created a chef-inspired menu using unique culinary techniques with the best quality proteins, veggies and grains. Our homemade, fresh & slow cooked ingredients will satisfy any appetite and our big, bold flavours delight flexitarians, vegans and everyone in between. And most importantly, we serve it up in an efficient and convenient way. It’s Indian food cooked slow, but served fast.
